title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Minimum Conditions for Examining Agriculture Plant Species) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (minimum condition examining agriculture plant species) (amendment) regulation 2023

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining 
Agriculture Plant Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 122 of 2004) are 
amended by substituting in Regulation 2 for the definition of “Directive” (as 
amended by the European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining 
Agriculture Plant Species) (Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 594 of 
2022) the following- 

“‘Directive’ means Commission Directive No. 2003/90/EC of 6 October 
20032 as amended by Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 
2022/1647 of 23rd September 2022;”.
text_norm: 2 european community (minimum condition examining agriculture plant species) regulation 2004 (s.i no 122 2004) amended substituting regulation 2 definition directive (as amended european community (minimum condition examining agriculture plant species) (amendment) regulation 2022 (s.i no 594 2022) following- directive mean commission directive no 2003 90 ec 6 october 20032 amended commission implementing directive (eu) 2022 1647 23rd september 2022

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining
text_raw:
3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining 
Agriculture Plant Species) (Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 594 of 
2022) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 June, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 O.J. No. L 248, 26.09.2022, p.47 
2 O.J. No. L 254, 08.10.2003, p.7 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [285] 3

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2022/1647 of 23 September 2022 which amends Council 
Directive 2003/90/EC which provides for a derogation for organic varieties of 
agricultural plant species suitable for organic production. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [285]
